casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2005-0276. State v. Ayers.

Cuyahoga App. No. 86006, 2005-Ohio-6972. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2005-2336, State v. Buehler, Cuyahoga App. No. 85796, 2005-Ohio-5717; and briefing schedule stayed.

Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
